alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Garfield; Petroleum; Southwest Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 8:32PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Phillips, Petroleum and southwestern Garfield Counties through 930 PM MDT... At 832 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Sand Springs, or 33 miles east of Winnett, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winnett, Flatwillow, Sand Springs, U L Bend Rec Area, Edwards, Mosby, Crooked Creek Rec Area, Brusett, Petrolia Lake, Steve Fork, Cat Creek and Tiegen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Garfield; Petroleum; Southwest Phillips
